item.title: 在山丘上 "翱翔 "或与小狗 "玩耍"，斯坦福大学的这项研究发现，老年人喜欢虚拟现实，这不仅能改善他们的情绪，还能改善他们与工作人员的互动。
item.description:
“Soaring” over hills or “playing” with puppies, this Stanford study found seniors enjoy virtual reality, improving both their emotions and their interactions with staff. pic.twitter.com/2XyJKR1GYB

— The Associated Press (@AP) February 25, 2024
